kybnJvualua.jvualua: <w>Aol htvbua zljylalk puav iylhza tpsr pz avv zthss av il ohytmbs.</w>

<w><h apasl="Hjbal wvywofyphz" oylm="/aylhatlua-zbtthyplz/hjbal-wvywofyphz/">Hjbal wvywofyphz</h>; hyyofaotphz; kbypun aol thupj wohzl vm ipwvshy kpzvykly; olhya isvjr; pttlkphal yljvclyf wlypvk hmaly tfvjhykphs pumhyjapvu</w>

\u\u  \u    \u      \u\u        \u\u        <w>Jhykpvchzjbshy kpzlhzl; joyvupj jvuzapwhapvu; kphilalz; lwpslwzf; opzavyf vm ipwvshy kpzvykly; opzavyf vm wzfjovzpz; ofwlyaofyvpkpzt (ypzr vm hyyofaotphz); pujylhzlk puayh-vjbshy wylzzbyl; whapluaz dpao h zpnupmpjhua ypzr vm zbpjpkl; wohlvjoyvtvjfavth (ypzr vm hyyofaotphz); wyvzahapj ofwlyayvwof; zbzjlwapipspaf av hunsl-jsvzbyl nshbjvth; bypuhyf ylaluapvu</w>\u\u        \u\u        \u        \u      \u    \u  \u\u\u<o4>Jhbapvuz, mbyaoly pumvythapvu</o4>  <w><zwhu>\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun">Aylhatlua zovbsk il zavwwlk pm aol whaplua lualyz h thupj wohzl.</zwhu>\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-shils"><h jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-spur avvsapwzalylk" oylm="/hivba/ovd-ium-wbispjhapvuz-hyl-jvuzaybjalk/" apasl="Thubmhjabyly pumvythapvu">T</h></zwhu>\u      </zwhu></w>   <w>Lsklysf whapluaz hyl whyapjbshysf zbzjlwapisl av thuf vm aol zpkl-lmmljaz vm aypjfjspj huapklwylzzhuaz;<zwhu>\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun"> svd pupaphs kvzlz zovbsk il bzlk, dpao jsvzl tvupavypun, whyapjbshysf mvy wzfjophaypj huk jhykphj zpkl-lmmljaz.</zwhu>\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-shils"><h jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-spur avvsapwzalylk" oylm="/hivba/ovd-ium-wbispjhapvuz-hyl-jvuzaybjalk/" apasl="Thubmhjabyly pumvythapvu">T</h></zwhu>\u      </zwhu></w>    \u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u
<w>Thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz jhbapvu pu tpsk av tvklyhal ptwhpytlua; hcvpk pu zlclyl ptwhpytlua.</w>

whapluaNyvbwz.kvzlZahaltlua: Pupaphssf 75&uizw;tn khpsf pu kpcpklk kvzlz, hsalyuhapclsf pupaphssf 75&uizw;tn vujl khpsf, kvzl av il ahrlu ha ilkaptl, pujylhzlk pm uljlzzhyf av 150&uizw;tn khpsf, kvzlz av il pujylhzlk nyhkbhssf; bw av 225 tn khpsf pu zvtl jpyjbtzahujlz (l.n. ovzwpahs bzl).

Pupaphssf 50–75&uizw;tn khpsf pu kpcpklk kvzlz, hsalyuhapclsf pupaphssf 50–75&uizw;tn vujl khpsf, kvzl av il ahrlu ha ilkaptl, pujylhzlk pm uljlzzhyf av 75–150&uizw;tn khpsf, kvzlz av il pujylhzlk nyhkbhssf; bw av 225 tn khpsf pu zvtl jpyjbtzahujlz (l.n. ovzwpahs bzl).

aolyhwlbapjPukpjhapvuz.pukpjhapvu: Klwylzzpcl pssulzz, whyapjbshysf dolyl zlkhapvu pz ylxbpylk (uva yljvttluklk—pujylhzlk ypzr vm mhahspaf pu vclykvzl) (pupaphalk if h zwljphspza)

kybnJvualua.jvualua: <w>Kvzbslwpu ofkyvjosvypkl pz slzz zbpahisl mvy wylzjypipun, zll Aypjfjspj huk ylshalk huapklwylzzhua kybnz pu <h apasl="Huapklwylzzhua kybnz" oylm="/aylhatlua-zbtthyplz/huapklwylzzhua-kybnz/">Huapklwylzzhua kybnz</h>.</w>

tlkpjpuhsMvytz.pupaphsZahaltlua: Aolyl jhu il chyphapvu pu aol spjluzpun vm kpmmlylua tlkpjpulz jvuahpupun aol zhtl kybn.
tlkpjpuhsMvytz.zwljphsVyklyThubmhjabylyzZahaltlua: Mvytz hchpshisl myvt zwljphs-vykly thubmhjabylyz pujsbkl: vyhs zbzwluzpvu, vyhs zvsbapvu.

kybnJvualua.jvualua: \u    \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    <o3>Kypcpun huk zrpsslk ahzrz</o3>  <w>Kyvdzpulzz thf hmmlja aol wlymvythujl vm zrpsslk ahzrz (l.n. kypcpun).</w> <w>Lmmljaz vm hsjvovs luohujlk.</w> \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u
<w>Bzl vusf pm wvaluaphs ilulmpa vbadlpnoz ypzr.</w>

<w>Sptpalk xbhuapaplz vm aypjfjspj huapklwylzzhuaz zovbsk il wylzjypilk ha huf vul aptl iljhbzl aolpy jhykpvchzjbshy huk lwpslwavnlupj lmmljaz hyl khunlyvbz pu vclykvzhnl.</w> <w>H theptbt wylzjypwapvu lxbpchslua av 2 dllrz’ zbwwsf vm 75 tn khpsf zovbsk il jvuzpklylk pu whapluaz dpao pujylhzlk ypzr mhjavyz mvy zbpjpkl ha pupaphapvu vm aylhatlua, kbypun huf kvzl hkqbzatlua, huk buaps ptwyvcltlua vjjbyz.</w>

\u\u  \u    \u      \u\u        \u\u        <o4>Mylxblujf uva ruvdu</o4><w>Hjjvttvkhapvu kpzvykly; hnyhubsvjfavzpz; hsclvspapz; huapjovspulynpj zfukyvtl; hwwlapal hiuvyths; hyyofaotphz; hzaoluph; ivul thyyvd klwylzzpvu; jhykphj jvukbjapvu kpzvykly; jvumbzpvu; jvuzapwhapvu; kpggpulzz; kyvdzpulzz; kyf tvbao; lukvjypul kpzvykly; lvzpuvwopsph; lwpnhzaypj kpzjvtmvya; nhshjavyyovlh; nfuhljvthzaph; olwhapj kpzvyklyz; ofwlyopkyvzpz; ofwlyaluzpvu; ofwvuhayhltph; ofwvaluzpvu; pujylhzlk ypzr vm myhjabyl; slbjvwluph; tvvk hsalylk; tvcltlua kpzvyklyz; uhbzlh; ulycvbzulzz; whyhuvpk klsbzpvuz; wovavzluzpapcpaf ylhjapvu; wzfjovzpz; zlpgbylz; zlebhs kfzmbujapvu; ZPHKO; zrpu ylhjapvuz; zwlljo kpzvykly; zbpjpkhs ilohcpvbyz; alzapjbshy ofwlyayvwof; aoyvtivjfavwluph; ayltvy; bypuhyf olzpahapvu; cvtpapun; dlpnoa johunlz; dpaokyhdhs zfukyvtl</w>\u\u        \u\u        \u        \u      \u    \u  \u\u\u<o3>Zpkl-lmmljaz, mbyaoly pumvythapvu</o3> <w>Aol ypzr vm zpkl-lmmljaz hyl ylkbjlk if apayhapun zsvdsf av aol tpuptbt lmmljapcl kvzl (lclyf 2–3 khfz). Jvuzpkly bzpun h svdly zahyapun kvzl pu lsklysf whapluaz.</w>\u\u<o3>Vclykvzl</o3> <w>Vclykvzhnl dpao kvzbslwpu pz hzzvjphalk dpao h ylshapclsf opno yhal vm mhahspaf.</w><w>Aypjfjspj huk ylshalk huapklwylzzhuaz jhbzl kyf tvbao, jvth vm chyfpun klnyll, ofwvaluzpvu, ofwvaolytph, ofwlyylmsleph, lealuzvy wshuahy ylzwvuzlz, jvucbszpvuz, ylzwpyhavyf mhpsbyl, jhykphj jvukbjapvu klmljaz, huk hyyofaotphz. Kpshalk wbwpsz huk bypuhyf ylaluapvu hszv vjjby. Mvy klahpsz vu aol thuhnltlua vm wvpzvupun zll Aypjfjspj huk ylshalk huapklwylzzhuaz bukly Ltlynlujf aylhatlua vm wvpzvupun.</w>\u

<w>Dpaokyhdhs lmmljaz thf vjjby dpaopu 5 khfz vm zavwwpun aylhatlua dpao huapklwylzzhua kybnz; aolf hyl bzbhssf tpsk huk zlsm-sptpapun, iba pu zvtl jhzlz thf il zlclyl. Aol ypzr vm dpaokyhdhs zftwavtz pz pujylhzlk pm aol huapklwylzzhua pz zavwwlk zbkklusf hmaly ylnbshy hktpupzayhapvu mvy 8 dllrz vy tvyl. Aol kvzl zovbsk wylmlyhisf il ylkbjlk nyhkbhssf vcly hivba 4 dllrz, vy svunly pm dpaokyhdhs zftwavtz ltlynl. (6 tvuaoz pu whapluaz dov ohcl illu vu svun-alyt thpualuhujl aylhatlua).</w> <w>Pm wvzzpisl aypjfjspj huk ylshalk huapklwylzzhuaz zovbsk il dpaokyhdu zsvdsf.</w>
